description: Surrogate primary key for the record, uniquely identifying the asset-to-general-ledger mapping.
Identifier of the asset (vehicle/equipment) this mapping applies to; references the asset master.
Identifier of the general ledger (GL) account used to book transactions for the asset.
Flag indicating whether this is the default GL account for the asset (1=true, 0=false).
Free-text notes about the asset-to-GL assignment.
System-maintained timestamp of the most recent update to the record.
Likely timestamp of the last user-initiated change; column name suggests a user identifierâ€”confirm with SME.
User identifier that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
User identifier who last modified the record.
Timestamp when the record was last modified.
